Some Things Are Just…  
“Worth-It-To-See”
-----------------------------------------

Awesome Video:  
Olympic Champion, Ted Ligety, “practicing.”

[Click HERE to see video Click sunglasses (below) for card flip](https://instagram.com/p/BfAqRn_gbVu/)

card_2.cardText:
Ted “Shred” Ligety
==================

*   Youngest American man to ever win an Olympic Gold Medal in Alpine Skiing (Turin 2006): He was 21. He’s now 33.
*   First American man to win Gold Medal inA giant slalom (Sochi 2014).
*   Father of an infant son: Jax.
*   Last year at this time? He was recovering from back surgery.
